query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: First year training report
result.description: The deliverable, to be prepared by the WP4 leader, will include the reports on the training events and training courses organized during the reporting period. Each report on the training event will contain the agenda, the list of participants (signed), the lecturers’ presentations in pdf format, and pictures from the event. The event organizer will coordinate the preparation and delivery of the report to the WP4 leader. The research management and administration staff attending specific training courses will deliver to the WP4 leader the report on the course he/she attended.
